page.title: 06TOURISM
page.content:
in the summer.
For some people who prefer a quiet scenic holiday there are the cliffs and beyond the survey area, the backwaters. Its close proximity to London makes it an ideal resort for day trippers. In the peak summer period, day trippers number 4500, caravaners and campers total 7610, while about 250 holidaymakers stay in guest houses and hotels. In summer, the population increases to some 19000. 42% of residential visitors come from London, while 52% are from East Anglia and parts of the South East. Only 6% of residential visitors are from elsewhere.
One of the increasing trades in Walton as a result of tourism is the bed & breakfast guest house. People who
